Text:
I have tested this one and its great.
Please write comments and tell me what you think.
Happy seeding.
What did you use to extract this with ? MAC OSX 10.5.8 on a power PC ?

This is a iso file use a tool or a visual cd/dvd rom and mount it.
I have now experience with MAC.

For mac users. Download UnRarx, free at http://www.unrarx.com/ use finder and drop the downloaded files into UnRarX. It will make the iso for you. Double click the iso to mount and install. You can also burn this iso with "Disk Utility".
